data.lyric:
[ti:happiness (Explicit)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]happiness (Explicit) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:05.39]Lyrics by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:10.79]Composed by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:16.19]Honey when I'm above the trees
[00:20.75]I see this for what it is
[00:24.69]But now I'm right down in it all the years I've given
[00:28.71]Is just s**t we're dividing up
[00:32.76]Showed you all of my hiding spots
[00:36.72]I was dancing when the music stopped
[00:40.29]And in the disbelief I can't face reinvention
[00:46.79]I haven't met the new me yet
[00:55.48]There'll be happiness after you
[00:59.14]But there was happiness because of you
[01:03.14]Both of these things can be true
[01:06.10]There is happiness
[01:09.04]Past the blood and bruise
[01:13.07]Past the curses and cries
[01:16.86]Beyond the terror in the nightfall
[01:21.37]Haunted by the look in my eyes
[01:23.88]That would've loved you for a lifetime
[01:26.35]Leave it all behind
[01:28.48]And there is happiness
[01:32.72]Tell me when did your winning smile
[01:37.39]Begin to look like a smirk
[01:41.57]When did all our lessons start to look like weapons
[01:45.38]Pointed at my deepest hurt
[01:49.72]I hope she'll be a beautiful fool
[01:53.63]Who takes my spot next to you
[01:57.24]No I didn't mean that
[01:59.17]Sorry I can't see facts through all of my fury
[02:03.48]You haven't met the new me yet
[02:12.06]There'll be happiness after me
[02:15.83]But there was happiness because of me
[02:19.85]Both of these things I believe
[02:22.98]There is happiness
[02:25.61]In our history across our great divide
[02:33.46]There is a glorious sunrise
[02:38.04]Dappled with the flickers of light
[02:40.67]From the dress I wore at midnight leave it all behind
[02:45.32]And there is happiness
[02:50.86]I can't make it go away by making you a villain
[02:58.76]I guess it's the price I pay for seven years in heaven
[03:06.93]And I pulled your body into mine
[03:10.30]Every godd**n night now I get fake niceties
[03:14.93]No one teaches you what to do
[03:18.24]When a good man hurts you
[03:22.03]And you know you hurt him too
[03:26.85]Honey when I'm above the trees
[03:31.46]I see it for what it is
[03:35.41]But now my eyes leak acid rain
[03:38.28]On the pillow where you used to lay your head
[03:43.35]After giving you the best I had
[03:47.44]Tell me what to give after that
[03:51.39]All you want from me now is the green light of forgiveness
[03:57.55]You haven't met the new me yet
[04:01.46]And I think she'll give you that
[04:06.16]There'll be happiness after you
[04:09.83]But there was happiness because of you too
[04:13.96]Both of these things can be true
[04:17.14]There is happiness
[04:19.88]In our history across our great divide
[04:27.52]There is a glorious sunrise
[04:32.15]Dappled with the flickers of light
[04:34.69]From the dress I wore at midnight leave it all behind
[04:40.60]Oh leave it all behind
[04:44.93]Leave it all behind
[04:47.22]And there is happiness
data.trans:
[ti:happiness (Explicit)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.39]//
[00:10.79]//
[00:16.19]亲爱的 当我站上树梢
[00:20.75]我明白这一切的来龙去脉
[00:24.69]可如今 我深陷其中 我付出的所有岁月
[00:28.71]就是我们要分割的一切
[00:32.76]毫无保留地告诉你我所有藏身之处
[00:36.72]当音乐停止时 我依然翩翩起舞
[00:40.29]自我怀疑 我无法面对重塑自我
[00:46.79]我还没有认识全新的我
[00:55.48]在你之后 我会得到幸福
[00:59.14]可正是因为你 我曾经拥有过幸福
[01:03.14]两者都千真万确
[01:06.10]我们沉浸在幸福里
[01:09.04]经历过鲜血淋漓和遍体鳞伤
[01:13.07]经历过咒骂和哭泣
[01:16.86]除了黑夜里的恐惧
[01:21.37]遭受着我深情眼神的困扰
[01:23.88]我本可以爱你一生一世
[01:26.35]将一切抛诸脑后
[01:28.48]我们沉浸在幸福里
[01:32.72]告诉我 从什么时候开始
[01:37.39]你迷人的微笑变成敷衍的假笑
[01:41.57]从什么时候开始 我们得到的教训变成武器
[01:45.38]指向我最深处的伤口
[01:49.72]我希望她是空有美貌的傻瓜
[01:53.63]她取代我的位置 站在你身旁
[01:57.24]我不是那个意思
[01:59.17]抱歉 我无法透过我满腔怒火看清真相
[02:03.48]你还没有认识全新的我
[02:12.06]在我之后 你会得到幸福
[02:15.83]可正是因为你 我曾经拥有过幸福
[02:19.85]两者我深信不疑
[02:22.98]我们沉浸在幸福里
[02:25.61]在我们的过往里 跨越我们巨大的鸿沟
[02:33.46]壮丽的日出映入眼帘
[02:38.04]闪耀着斑驳的光芒
[02:40.67]从我在午夜时分穿过的礼裙开始 将一切抛诸脑后
[02:45.32]我们沉浸在幸福里
[02:50.86]我无法将你塑造成坏人 从而让一切烟消云散
[02:58.76]我想这就是我在天堂度过七年时光所付出的代价
[03:06.93]我让你紧紧地依偎着我
[03:10.30]每一个漫长寒冷的夜晚 我得到虚无缥缈的美好
[03:14.93]没有人教你该怎么办
[03:18.24]当一个好男人伤害你时
[03:22.03]你知道你也伤害了他
[03:26.85]亲爱的 当我站上树梢
[03:31.46]我明白这一切的来龙去脉
[03:35.41]如今 我的眼睛留下酸涩的泪水
[03:38.28]滴落在你曾经躺过的枕头上
[03:43.35]在我为你付我最好的一切后
[03:47.44]告诉我 在那之后我还能付出什么
[03:51.39]如今 你渴望从我这里得到是宽恕
[03:57.55]你还没有认识全新的我
[04:01.46]我想她会让你如愿以偿
[04:06.16]在你之后 我会得到幸福
[04:09.83]可正是因为你 我也曾拥有幸福
[04:13.96]两者都千真万确
[04:17.14]我们沉浸在幸福里
[04:19.88]在我们的过往里 跨越我们巨大的鸿沟
[04:27.52]壮丽的日出映入眼帘
[04:32.15]闪耀着斑驳的光芒
[04:34.69]从我在午夜时分穿过的礼裙开始 将一切抛诸脑后
[04:40.60]将一切抛诸脑后
[04:44.93]将一切抛诸脑后
[04:47.22]我们沉浸在幸福里
